attributes.action: Balls to Cancer must be political correctness
attributes.additional_details:
Balls to cancer the Male cancer charity is trying to bring awareness, education and support to male cancer sufferers and their families.
We are being hindered in our fight by the media not being willing to use the word Balls because they are scared of the political correct complaints. We are fighting for the rights of 200,000 men every year who are hit by the disease why cant the media see this and ignore the tiny minority that "may" complain? Help us change this and save lives.
